greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangular array T(n,k) = A156552(A005940(1+n)*A005940(1+k)), read by rows, with n >= 0, 0 <= k <= n.
comment: A341520 is the main entry for this dyadic function. See comments there.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10439; the first 144 rows of the triangle
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
program: A341521list(up_to) = { my(v = vector(1+up_to), i=0); for(n=0,oo, for(k=0,n, i++; if(i > #v, return(v)); v[i] = A341520sq(n,k))); (v); };
xref: The lower triangular region of A341520 read by rows.
Cf. A001477 (the left edge), A088698 (the right edge).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 15 2021
